name: Oduwa Coin
public_notice: Oduwa Wallet has been updated to v2.0. For more information, refer to this

description.en:
OduwaCoin is a free open source project derived from collaborative blockchain Mirror of Bitcoin, PPCoin and NovaCoin with the goal of providing a long-term energy-efficient scrypt-based crypto-currency.

Built on the foundation of Hybrid Blockchain POW/POS, innovations such as proof-of-stake help further advance the field of crypto-currency and boosting nearly NO-transaction fees for all users.
